messages.title: Only Labour can bring our country together again
messages.content: Boris Johnson’s Tories are the biggest threat to Scotland’s place in the UK. Labour has a plan to rebuild and transform Scotland, so that no one is held back and no community is neglected. We will invest in rebuilding public services and tackling climate change, creating jobs and improving living standards.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
End homelessness by building 120,000 new council and social houses, creating at least 50,000 jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
Ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers’ rights.
Invest in Scotland’s people, communities and public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give you the final say on Brexit

issues.brexitEurope: Give you the final say on Brexit with Scottish Labour campaigning to Remain.
issues.environment: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS to provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
issues.labourEmployment: Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers’ rights.

community.content: Tackle Scotland’s housing crisis and end homelessness by building 120,000 new council and social houses, creating at least 50,000 jobs.

examples: Gives the final say on Brexit with Scottish Labour campaigning to Remain.
Deliver £100 billion of additional funding to invest in Scotland’s people, communities and public services.
Only Labour can bring our country together again.
Tackle Scotland’s housing crisis and end homelessness by building 120,000 new council and social houses.
Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers’ rights.
Invest in our NHS to provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
Give you the final say on Brexit with Scottish Labour campaigning to Remain.
Boris Johnson’s Tories are the biggest threat to Scotland’s place in the UK.
